https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/q7hZpaF8vRO56r3QgmJbC3vIQjT.jpg Benji has become stranded on a remote island after a boating accident. He finds himself struggling to survive in the wilderness, avoiding close encounters with a wolf, a bear, and a territorial female cougar with her cub. Benji the Hunted
